content:
When I run "isabelle build" to produce pdf, some error occurs like:

Latex error (line 44 of "~~/gambler/gamblertest.thy"):
  Undefined control sequence.
  <recently read> \bigsqcap

  ...en\ {\isasyminfinity}\ else\ {\isasymSqinter

If I understand it right, the error states that it cannot recognize \bigsqcap thanks to the lack of specifc package.
So how to fix that? just add \usepackage{mathptmx}? but I have no idea where to add this package.
There is a list of commented out \usepackages in root.tex, enable them in that file
looks like you want to uncomment the stmaryrd line
